name: Google Sheets
p: Triggered when a new row is added to the bottom of a spreadsheet - works best with Team Drives.

name: Google Sheets
p: Triggered when you create a new spreadsheet.

name: Google Sheets
p: Triggered when a new row is added or modified in a spreadsheet.

name: Google Sheets
p: Create a new column in a specific spreadsheet.

name: Google Sheets
p: Create one or more new rows in a specific spreadsheet (with line item support).

name: Google Sheets
p: Create a blank spreadsheet or duplicate an existing spreadsheet. Optionally, provide headers.

name: Google Sheets
p: Deletes the content of a row in a specific spreadsheet. Deleted rows will appear as blank rows in your spreadsheet. Please use with caution.

name: Google Sheets
p: Update a row in a specific spreadsheet.

name: Google Sheets
p: This is an advanced action which makes a raw HTTP request that includes this integration's authentication.

name: Google Sheets
p: Finds a worksheet by title.

name: Google Sheets
p: Finds a row by a column and value. Returns the entire row if one is found.

name: Google Sheets
p: Finds or creates a specific lookup row.

name: Google Sheets
p: Triggered when a new row is added to the bottom of a spreadsheet.

name: Google Sheets
h2: New or Updated Spreadsheet Row (Team Drive)
p: Triggered when a new row is added or modified in a spreadsheet - works best with Team Drives.

name: Google Sheets
p: Triggered when you create a new worksheet in a spreadsheet.

p: Create a new row in a specific spreadsheet.

p: Create a new worksheet by copying an existing worksheet.

p: Create a blank worksheet with a title. Optionally, provide headers.

p: Format a row in a specific spreadsheet.

name: Google Sheets
p: Update one or more new rows in a specific spreadsheet (with line item support).

name: Google Sheets
h2: Lookup Spreadsheet Rows (output as Line Items)
p: Finds many matched rows (500 max.) by a column and value.

name: Google Sheets
h2: Get Many Spreadsheet Rows (Advanced, output as Line Items)
p: Returns many rows (500 max.) as a single JSON value and flat rows (line items).

name: Google Sheets
p: Finds or creates a specific find worksheet.
